info_items.title: Expense tracking
info_items.text: Smart notification and integration with all major bank apps help you not to forget about a dime you spent

info_items.title: Comprehensive analytics
info_items.text: Daily, weekly, monthly and annual reports allow you to deeply analyze your expenses to understand how to spend your money practically

info_items.title: Smart predictions
info_items.text: Unique algorithm predicts your upcoming expenses allowing you to plan your future better

info_items.title: Limits and budgets
info_items.text: Customizable strictness of limits on your different accounts allow you to treat yourself from time to time while being very practical in general
